short_summary: Relocation of personal effects, furniture, specialized equipment, and accessories
description: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is issuing a REQUEST FOR PROPOSAL (RFP) for the provision of moving services for personal effects, furniture, specialized equipment, and accessories for the Department of National Defense.
tags: Public Works and Government Services Canada
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**

### Solicitation Details

#### Title
EF245-232182 - Relocation of the Canadian Armed Forces Recruiting Center

#### Reference Number
WS3994493983-Doc4031563413

#### Tendering Status
Expired

#### Solicitation Type
RFP against Supply Arrangement

#### Industry Category
Professional, Scientific and Technical Services, specifically relating to Relocation Services (UNSPSC Code 78101804)

#### Localization
Montréal, QC, Canada

#### Government Department
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

#### Buyer Contact Information
* Name: Fahad Zanoun (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [fahad.zanoun@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:fahad.zanoun@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Tendering Documents
For suppliers selected to prequalify for this tender, the solicitation documents can be found on the [Discovery Ariba platform](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16432505?extsite=MTY0MzI1MDVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

#### Requirement Description
Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is soliciting proposals for the provision of moving services for personal effects, furniture, specialized equipment and accessories for the Department of National Defense.

#### Notice Period
The tender was published on May 30, 2023, and the closing date is on June 05, 2023, at 14:00:00.

#### Important Notice
This bid solicitation cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number Doc3994494050 (EF245-232182). A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders/offerors/suppliers who bid on the previous solicitation.

#### Shortlisted Firms
The following firms have a pre-existing supply arrangement for relocation services with the government:
* Quali-T-Plus Inc.
* Expert Mobilier
* Déménagement Performance
